amendment.description: Amendment sought to require crowdfunding intermediaries to disclose how they are compensated.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 112-265 to require crowdfunding intermediaries to disclose their method of compensation to potential investors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 234 (Roll no. 823).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Velazquez.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 234 (Roll no. 823).
